channel.title: CVE Feed for Delta Electronics -- CNCSoft ScreenEditor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Delta Electronics -- CNCSoft ScreenEditor

item.title: CVE-2019-10982|2024-08-04T22:40:15.604Z -- delta%20electronics -- cncsoft%20screeneditor
item.description: Delta Electronics CNCSoft ScreenEditor, Versions 1.00.89 and prior. Multiple heap-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities may be exploited by processing specially crafted project files, allowing an attacker to remotely execute arbitrary code. There is a lack of user input validation before copying data from project files onto the heap.

item.title: CVE-2019-10992|2024-08-04T22:40:15.645Z -- delta%20electronics -- cncsoft%20screeneditor
item.description: Delta Electronics CNCSoft ScreenEditor, Versions 1.00.89 and prior. Multiple out-of-bounds read vulnerabilities may cause information disclosure due to lacking user input validation for processing project files.
